title: 2 Bedroom with private outdoor on edge of Williamsburg and Flushing!
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Beautiful two bedroom located just five blocks from the MORGAN L train in the heart of Bushwick. Bright, spacious and sunny with stainless steel appliances, queen sized bedrooms + closets. Enjoy relaxing weekends and entertaining friends in your shared yard.

Right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie’s, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara’s, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.

Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn’s hottest neighborhoods. Come experience all that makes Bushwick fabulous!

No Fee!! First and Security!! Pets are Welcome!!
